channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-14551] Procedure v2 - Reimplement split
item.description: use the proc-v2 state machine for split. also update the logic to have a single meta-writer.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: The change can be reviewed in https://reviews.apache.org/r/50509/

The Test Results does not show any failing test - re-run those Timed out tests in my local machine, no problem at all.

Hey Stephen Yuan Jiang, can you update the release notes with info about the change in semantics that phil brings up?

customfieldvalues.customfieldvalue: Moved the Split Region logic to Master and most of split region coprocessor is in master now. Need to change dependency such as Phoenix.
